title: Finding Me Love is Not Easy Series Book One
description: Ever since her mother died Aimee Pittman has dreamed of attending college in her mom’s home country of Neahovia. When she is accepted to Ancaster University her dream becomes reality. She and her best friend Piper share a co-ed flat with five of Pipers childhood friends. Aimee immediately bonds and the small group becomes as close as family.When Aimee hits a roadblock researching her mother’s life in Neahovia she becomes more determined to find out what happen to her mother in Neahovia that caused her to leave. Her friends vow to help and together the small group is faced with learning the reality that life and love is not as easy as they thought. Can Aimee and her friends learn the lessons of life God reveals to them? Will their friendships survive their first year of college?
author: Nicole Rickman
